description.value:
You add two new wizard encounter attack powers to your spellbook. The powers must be of 7th level or lower, and the two function as daily attack powers for you.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.ghNfy7D5z13aSLpA]{Lightning Bolt}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.VA9nKqCzHM1OSbeP]{Spectral Ram}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.7E4vIc2LZlbjNsYy]{Winter's Wrath}
